Enumerations

This example shows how to create an Enumeration using the UmlCanvas DSL. 

  
Diagram myDiagram +dynamic {
  [@37,18]
  enumeration anEnumeration +abstract;
  [@184,19]
  interface anInterface;
  [@100,100]
  enumeration myEnum : anInterface : anEnumeration +abstract {
    Literal value1;
    Literal value2;
    Literal value3;
  }
}
